intro: Tithymalopsis paniculata, commonly known as the panicled tithymal, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. The plant produces showy, clustered inflorescences of tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens, though it is not widely commercially available.
